rules_text:
Puzzlebox [i](Begin the game with this and another card you own from outside the game in the command zone, locked. That card is face down until you unlock this.)[/i]
{5}: Unlock Key to the Nexus. If {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} was spent to activate this ability, you may cast the revealed card without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, put that card on top of your library.
